description: Stores information about CPA firms, including contact details and address.
Stores information about client companies managed by CPA firms, including business contact details.
Stores employee details such as name, contact info, job title, salary type, and payroll frequency.
Stores information about pay periods, including start and end dates.
Stores individual payroll records, including employee ID, pay period ID, hours worked, and pay details.
Stores information about employee deductions, including deduction type and amount.
